text: Molly Kathleen Ringwald (born February 18, 1968) is an American actress. She was born in Roseville, California. She is best known for her starring roles in John Hughes movies Sixteen Candles (1984), The Breakfast Club (1985), and Pretty in Pink (1986). == Other websites == * Category:Actors from California Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1968 births Category:Living people
title: Molly Ringwald
